entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Project Runestone Hosts Auction Ahead of Airdrop
entry.summary: The largest ordinal inscription, the Runestone, is up for auction. The highest bid is $17,261.61.

entry.title: Goofy Biden and Trump Meme Coins Are Skyrocketing on Solana
entry.summary: Degens who caught the newest Solana meme coin sensation—led by “Jeo Boden”—early this week are currently sitting on well over 100x returns.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Could Be Added to State Retirement Portfolios in Arizona
entry.summary: Lawmakers in The Grand Canyon State cite the rapid growth seen by funds tracking the digital asset.

entry.title: 'Imagine the Smell': Binance Perfume Stunt Mocked, Denounced as Sexist
entry.summary: Meant to celebrate International Women’s Day, a female-focused ad campaign from crypto exchange Binance appears to have backfired.

entry.summary: Island-based sandbox game Nifty Island has been drawing plaudits from crypto gaming streamers and reviewers.

entry.title: Wormhole Unveils Airdrop Details—Here's What You Need to Know
entry.summary: The Wormhole governance token is coming soon across Solana, Ethereum, and beyond. Here are the latest airdrop details.

entry.title: ‘Shrapnel’ Game Tweaks Token Schedule With 75% Less SHRAP Unlocking in April
entry.summary: Avalanche first-person shooter Shrapnel has revised its token plans to spread its team and investor unlocks out further. Here’s why.

entry.title: OpenAI Pushes Back on Elon Musk Lawsuit, Releasing Internal Emails
entry.summary: While Musk claims the AI giant abandoned its founding principles, email messages from the tech tycoon suggest he was also focused on profits.

entry.title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Added $778 Million in BTC Amid All-Time High
entry.summary: The BlackRock iShares Bitcoin ETF added 12,447 BTC on Tuesday during a record-setting day for both the ETF and Bitcoin's own price.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Are Starting to Compete With S&P 500, Says Michael Saylor
entry.summary: The MicroStrategy CEO predicts Bitcoin ETF growth will soon outpace other leading ETFs.

entry.title: What is DePIN? Bringing Physical Infrastructure to Blockchain
entry.summary: DePINs, or decentralized physical infrastructure networks, are an increasingly popular application of blockchain. Here's how they work.

entry.title: Coinbase Is Giving Out Free Cards and Currency for Ethereum NFT Game 'Parallel'
entry.summary: With card-battler Parallel now in open beta, Coinbase and Base are offering freebies to tempt new players into the Ethereum game.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces Back From Massive Dip, But Volatility Lingers
entry.summary: BTC had a wild ride after reaching a new all-time high. And the volatility remains as the number one cryptocurrency regains momentum.

entry.title: Solana's New Top Dog? Meme Coin Dogwifhat Flips BONK for First Time
entry.summary: It's a dog coin battle on Solana as BONK and WIF swap spots, if only temporarily. Will Dogwifhat take a permanent lead?

entry.title: AI-Powered Humanoid Robots Are Coming—If We Insist On Building Them
entry.summary: A robotics experts weighs in on the persistent vision of household androids, noting “a lot of hype and inflated expectations.”

entry.summary: Dogwifhat is still riding high after it was listed on Binance earlier this week. Could it flip fellow Solana meme coin BONK?

entry.title: Ethereum Hits $3,800 for First Time Since December 2021
entry.summary: Ethereum jumped above $3,800 Wednesday morning for the first time since December 2021, as anticipation mounts for its Dencun upgrade.

entry.title: Shuttered Crypto Exchange ShapeShift Settles Illegal Securities Charges With SEC
entry.summary: Founded in 2014 by Erik Voorhees, ShapeShift shapeshifted to a decentralized, non-custodial model in 2018.

entry.title: Bitcoin Continues to Fall After Hitting All-Time High. Is This Fine?
entry.summary: Bitcoin deflates over 8%, mirroring past volatility as it falls to $62,000. One expert isn’t worried.

entry.title: Bitcoin Sets New All-Time High—But What's the Actual Record Price?
entry.summary: Some crypto price aggregators said Bitcoin hit a new high today. Some disagreed. Does that discrepancy really matter?

entry.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Sets New Record With $3.8 Billion In Trading Volume
entry.summary: The ten spot Bitcoin ETFs experienced $10 billion in combined trading day volume.

entry.title: Notcoin: How to Boost Your Earnings Before the Telegram Game's Airdrop
entry.summary: Are you tapping your way to millions of Notcoin? Here's how to make the most of the game before the token airdrop.

entry.title: LUNA Pumps 77% as Do Kwon Evades Extradition—But the Gains Are Fading
entry.summary: The rebooted LUNA and LUNA Classic (LUNC) both skyrocketed on Tuesday on news of Terra founder Do Kwon's latest legal developments.

entry.title: Coinbase Crashed Again—Why Does It Happen So Often During Bitcoin Runs?
entry.summary: The major crypto exchange had reported a prior problem resolved just minutes before the latest outage.

entry.title: Dogecoin Has Doubled in Price This Week—And SHIB Has Tripled
entry.summary: Meme coins are still the biggest winners—despite the crypto crash this morning.

entry.title: Ubisoft Bringing ‘Watch Dogs’ NFTs to Ethereum Card Game ‘Cross the Ages’
entry.summary: Cards based on the Watch Dogs series will be released for an Ethereum card game on Immutable X that Ubisoft invested in.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR #72 - DOGS ON TOP!
entry.summary: ETFs see another $562m net inflow. Fear & Greed hits 90, was above for months in 2021. ETH leads majors, beta-plays take lead in altcoins. BlackRock to start buying BTC in its largest fund. MicroStrategy plans $600m capital raise to buy BTC. BTC flips market cap of Silver. WIF to be listed on Binance, rises 20%. PEPE & WIF mentioned on Bloomberg. Alien Punk sells for $16m, ‘NFTs not dead’. 3 more large NFT sales for $500K.

entry.title: Terra Founder Do Kwon Escapes Extradition to United States—Again
entry.summary: Once again, the case will head to a lower court to be retried. Terra founder Do Kwon faces charges over the collapse of LUNA and UST.

entry.title: Coachella Festival Gives NFT Passes Another Try Following FTX Mess
entry.summary: The FTX collapse caused chaos around its last NFTs, but Coachella is starting fresh on Avalanche with OpenSea.

entry.title: Crypto Twitter Reacts to Bitcoin Hitting All-Time High: 'We Fucking Did It'
entry.summary: Some cried. Some gloated. Some got poetic. But all were in reverence about Bitcoin setting a new all-time high for the first time since 2021.

entry.title: Bitcoin Crashes 6% After Hitting New All-Time High Price
entry.summary: In the past hour alone, $32 million long positions have been liquidated.

entry.title: It’s Happening: Bitcoin Hits New All-Time High Price Above $69K
entry.summary: The asset has soared since spot Bitcoin ETFs got the green light in January.

entry.title: Xsolla Unveils Cross-Play And Cross-Pay Strategy For Enhanced Multi-Platform Monetization For Mobile Games
entry.summary: Xsolla, a global video game commerce company, has introduced Cross-Play and Cross-Pay, an innovative approach to mobile game monetization.

entry.title: BlackRock Seeks to Add Bitcoin ETFs to Its Strategic Portfolio
entry.summary: The investment giant files an application with the SEC to include Bitcoin ETFs in a new fund, emphasizing investment risks and potential fees.

entry.title: Terraform Labs Hits Back at SEC 'Government Overreach' Over Special Counsel Payment
entry.summary: In its objection, the regulator argued that Terraform Labs "siphoned" $166 million into an "opaque slush fund" for law firm Dentons.

entry.title: Staked Ethereum Grows to $116 Billion a Week Before Dencun Upgrade
entry.summary: The amount of ETH staked on the Ethereum network has increased by 9% since the start of the year, as the Dencun upgrade looms.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Are Reshaping the NFT Marketplace Landscape
entry.summary: With Bitcoin inches away from setting a new all-time high price, rising Ordinals sales have flung one NFT marketplace on top.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Stock Surges 24% as Bitcoin Nears All-Time High Price
entry.summary: The only time MSTR was priced higher than today was back in 2000.

entry.title: Interview: How SocialFi Will Transform Crypto Farming Game 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Pixels founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss how the Ronin-based farming game will be transformed through the addition of guilds and changes to resource generation. They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users
entry.summary: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.

entry.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'
entry.summary: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.

entry.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator
entry.summary: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sébastien Borget: 'The Future of Gaming is User-Generated Content'
entry.summary: Sébastien Borget, COO and co-founder of The Sandbox, joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse platform's launch of user-generated content, AI in gaming, and open metaverse standards.

entry.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'
entry.summary: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Teams Up With Unstoppable Domains
entry.summary: Pudgy Penguins CEO Luca Netz and Unstoppable Domains COO Sandy Carter joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the launch of the NFT collection's .pudgy domains, its second line of toys at Walmat, and the upcoming launch of the Pudgy World game.

entry.title: Improbable Chief Product Officer: Web3 Games Need to Put Experience, Game Logic Onchain
entry.summary: Improbable's Rob Whitehead joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse technology firm's collaborations with blue-chip NFT collections, and how adding tens of thousands of players to a game will work in practice.

entry.title: Ledger: 'Probably Five Years' Before Phones With Fully Integrated Hardware Wallets
entry.summary: Ledger's Chief Experience Officer Ian Rogers sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk security, hacks, and where the current generation of smartphone crypto wallets fall short.

entry.title: What Is Notcoin? Co-Creator Sasha Plotvinov Explains the Viral Telegram Game and Token
entry.summary: Notcoin, a simple clicker-style game within messaging app Telegram, has racked up over 25 million players since the start of 2024 and plans to convert the trillions of virtual coins mined so far into a real crypto token on The Open Network. Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to explain the viral phenomenon.

entry.title: 'Pixels' Founder Luke Barwikowski on the Game's Wild Rise and Ronin Move
entry.summary: Ahead of the PIXEL token launch, Pixels game founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the hectic last few months—and why the game migrated between Ethereum scaling networks, from Polygon to Ronin.

entry.title: How Arbitrum Won the 'ApeChain' Vote for an ApeCoin Ethereum Scaler
entry.summary: Offchain Labs co-founder and CEO Steven Goldfeder joined Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to discuss the ApeCoin DAO's vote to create an Ethereum layer-2 gaming network on Arbitrum for the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem.

entry.title: Recommend-To-Earn: Tokenizing Travel Recommendations with Sam Simmons
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Sam Simmons, founder of MintPass.
They discuss: - The Parallels between Professional Poker and Crypto - The profitability of Ethics - The "Recommend-To-Earn" economy

entry.title: The Collected: Grant Riven Yun's Journey Through Art and Medicine
entry.summary: The Collected's Rachel Wilkins joins digital artist Grant Riven Yun to explore his remarkable journey blending art with medical studies, to achieve over $2 million in sales.

entry.title: Nifty Island Co-Founder on Why Play-to-Airdrop Is the Game's 'Booster Rocket'
entry.summary: Nifty Island co-founder Charles Smith joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the game's play-to-airdrop campaign, why token incentives are so important to getting crypto games off the ground, and how the team plans to sustain its growth going forward.
